item.title: Cyber London | Europe's first cyber security accelerator and incubator space
item.description:
Cyber London | Europe's first cyber security accelerator and incubator space

Founder Amadeus Capital Partners In 1996 Alex co-founded nCipher with venture capital backing to develop internet security products using advanced cryptography. The company became a world leader in IT security, counting major banks, finance companies and governments among its customers.

item.title: Cisco Systems' London IDEA Center A Great Example How The Company Drives IoT Innovation
item.description:
Cisco Systems' London IDEA Center A Great Example How The Company Drives IoT Innovation

As I've personally experienced and written about many times, large corporations have a greater challenge innovating versus smaller ones. This reality can be seen across all industries, but is most pronounced in the tech industry where the rapid pace of innovation drives future growth and profits. As a part of [...]

item.title: Gary Kovacs speaking at CES 2016 - IOT: The Biggest Security Threat to Everything
item.description:
Gary Kovacs speaking at CES 2016 - IOT: The Biggest Security Threat to Everything

AVG Technologies' CEO, Gary Kovacs, delivers his talk, "IoT: The Biggest Security Threat to Everything," at the inaugural CyberSecurity Forum 2016 at CES on January 6, presented by CyberVista. Gary discusses why it's up to the tech industry to make the Internet of Things (IoT) more private and secure, and why it will require a level of inquiry and accountability that we're not accustomed to.

item.title: The Best B2B Growth Hacks - 21 Tactics to Test
item.description:
The Best B2B Growth Hacks - 21 Tactics to Test

As you are all probably tired of hearing by now, growth hacking is not simply a series of tricks or tactics, but a mindset to do what it takes to grow a company. It is data-driven and dovetails quite a bit with online marketing.
